articles.author: Raven Saunt
articles.title: Vulgar groom is SLAMMED over his 'disgusting' wedding vows - Daily Mail
articles.description: Photographer Jonathan Pajak shared a clip to TikTok of Michael and Destiny Lentini at their wedding in Plant City, Florida. The groom shocked guests with his vows at the ceremony.
articles.content:
A groom has been fiercely criticized for his vulgar wedding vows in which he told his wife to 'keep my belly full and my balls empty.'
Photographer Jonathan Pajak shared a clip to TikTok that showed… [+5298 chars]
